User Guide: iGesture Workbench - Tutorial
Composite Test Bench Tab Tutorial The Composite Test Bench can be used to test the recognition of composite gestures. One or more Recognisers can be created by configuring them with one or more algorithms, gesture sets and devices that send the captured input to the Recogniser. Then the Multi-modal Recogniser can be configured with a gesture set that contains composite gestures. After starting the recognition process, the recognition results are shown on the bottom.
Figure 1: Composite Test Bench Tab
